QuestData.Title: Poulticide
QuestData.Description: We be huntin' something so big, so savage, we gonna need anotha poison. We gonna need a big ol' poultice of poison!$b$bSo... boss-mon? Ya think ya up for a little flower pickin'? We gonna need the leaves of them frostbloom plants that be growing along the shadows of rocks and ledges along the sides of the Cracking Plains.$b$bBe careful when pickin' them, boss-mon! They not always be by themselves...
QuestData.RewardText: Haha! Ya brought 'em! I hope ya not offended I asked such a lowly task of ya. We needed the leaves, and I needed to settle a bet.
